Optional course: Choose 3 units from PHI1101, PHI1370, PSY1101, PSY1102, SOC1101, or SOC1106.
APA4200 or APA4211 is offered year-round and counts as 3 units per term. Enrolment deadline for APA4211 is June 30.

Students admitted to co-op may replace 6 units with 6 optional APA courses at the 3000 or 4000 level.
You may add a 30-unit minor which replaces your 30 units of electives.

Advanced standing students should contact the Academic Office to adjust their sequence.
